Title: Stranger Than Fiction
Actors: Will Ferrell, William Dick, Guy Massey, Martha Espinoza
Plot: I.R.S. auditor Harold Crick suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 14 nominations.
